response.original_title: Kick It Like Frankreich: Der Aufstand der Studenten
response.overview: The new anger has meanwhile also gripped the students. Whether in Hamburg, North Rhine-Westphalia or Hessen, thousands of students are taking to the streets to protest against the introduction of general tuition fees. For the right to free education, against the creeping privatization of education and the social exclusion of students from low-income families.
response.title: Kick It Like Frankreich: Der Aufstand der Studenten
